articles.title: Gamers at risk of irreversible hearing loss and tinnitus, study suggests - BBC.com
articles.description: A new review of available evidence suggests video gamers regularly exceed safe sound limits.
articles.content:
By Imran Rahman-JonesBBC News
People who play video games are at risk of damaging their hearing due to potentially unsafe sound levels, a study has found.

articles.author: Ethan Siegel
articles.title: Stars alone can't explain black holes, JWST data reveals - Big Think
articles.description: Today, supermassive black holes and their host galaxies tell a specific story in terms of mass. But JWST reveals a different story early on.
